GENEBlock::GENEBlock ( $  prayfile,
$  name,
$  content,
$  flags 
)

Creates a new GENEBlock

Parameters:
$prayfile The PRAYFile object this block belongs to. Can be null.
$name The block's name. This is a moniker, possibly ending in .gen. TODO: Does it end in gen?
$content The block's binary data. Used when constructing from a PrayFile
$flags The block's flags, which apply to the binary data as-is.
